QuestData.Title: No Time for Tryouts
QuestData.Description:
We don't have time for you to go through a lengthy set of tryouts. But, fighting in the arena is our best chance at getting you in good with the giants.
That kind-hearted giant over there that's losing against Bilgerudder is Sternfathom. If you were to defeat his hozen champion, you'd make yourself a spot on his team.
Looks like Ooker Dooker's taking a rest between bouts. Now's the time to deliver a good ol' monkey beatdown.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Send this guy packing so that you can take his place on Sternfathom's team.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver a beatdown to Ooker Dooker.
QuestData.CompletionText:
By giving that hozen a good beating, you'll be making a spot for yourself in the arena.
You don't have to kill him, though.
QuestData.RewardText:
You made quick work of that monkey. Now there's an empty position on Sternfathom's team that you can fill.
But first, let's get me set up for what comes after your big match.
